title: How to keep your phone charged and working in wildfires
description: Tech tips to stay in touch, find help and be safe during storms, from getting the right emergency alerts to making your smartphone battery last in a power outage.

title: These aircraft can (almost) fly themselves. We gave one a try.
description: Step inside the cockpit for a look at the future of autonomous flying.

title: Virtual reality has expanded into a new field: Job training
description: More and more employers are using VR to train their workers, seeking to provide trainees with something close to real-world experience simply by putting on a headset.

title: It’s a great time to buy a laptop. Here’s how to get started.
description: There’s never been a better time to be searching for a new computer.

title: Hospital bosses love AI. Doctors and nurses are worried.
description: Mount Sinai and other elite hospitals are pouring millions of dollars into chatbots and AI tools, as doctors and nurses worry the technology will upend their jobs.
